verses.roman:
viṁśa-paricchede--nija-'śikṣāṣṭaka' paḍiyā
tāra artha āsvādilā premāviṣṭa hañā

synonyms: viṁśa-paricchede—in the Twentieth Chapter; nija-śikṣāṣṭaka paḍiyā—reciting His own Śikṣāṣṭaka verses; tāra artha—their meaning; āsvādilā—tasted; prema-āviṣṭa hañā—being absorbed in ecstatic love.
translation: In the Twentieth Chapter, Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu recited His own eight stanzas of instruction and tasted their meaning in ecstatic love.
